name: Clients Management
description: Efficiently organize and manage your law firm's client information, including contact details, case history, and document access with comprehensive profiles.

name: Cases Management
description: Track and manage all your legal cases with detailed timelines, status updates, and task assignment for complete case oversight and organization.

name: Leads Management
description: Capture and nurture potential clients through a structured pipeline, tracking communications and conversion rates to grow your practice.

name: Tasks Management
description: Assign and track tasks across your team with deadlines, priorities, and status updates to ensure nothing falls through the cracks.

name: Legal Agenda
description: Comprehensive calendar system for court dates, client meetings, deadlines, and internal events with reminders and team scheduling.

name: Documents Storage
description: Secure cloud storage for all case documents with version control, client access permissions, and easy search functionality.

name: Document Templates
description: Create, store, and use legal document templates with variable fields for quick and consistent document generation.

name: Financial Management
description: Track billable hours, generate invoices, manage payments, and monitor expenses with detailed financial reporting.

name: Multi-Tenant Security
description: Enterprise-grade security with complete data isolation between tenants, ensuring your firm's data remains private and protected.

name: Arabic (RTL) Support
description: Full Arabic language support with right-to-left text direction throughout the application for regional compatibility.

name: Custom User Roles
description: Define custom access levels for attorneys, paralegals, administrators, and other staff members to control system access.
